General.Name: Allied Industrial Ltd
General.Description: Allied Industrial Corp., Ltd. engages in manufacture and sale of disperse dyes in Taiwan. The company offers liquid, slurry, power, and granule type disperse dyes. Its products are used in dyeing and printing synthetic, polyester, and other fibers. The company also exports its products to Asia, Africa, the Americas, and other regions. Allied Industrial Corp., Ltd. was incorporated in 1964 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 76, Tun-Hwa South Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 10683

6.Name: Chieh-Wen  Huang
